issue.title: [Go] support for List
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3021](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3021). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
go-arrow should have support for creating List arrays.
